extension.valueString: Disorder codes pertaining to anxiety including:  obsessive-compulsive disorder, generalized anxiety disorder, panic disorder, posttraumatic stress disorder, social phobia, specific phobia (simple phobia), adjustment disorder with anxious features, acute stress disorder, substance-induced anxiety disorder, and anxiety due to a general medical condition.
Conditions related to pregnancy, newborns, and children.

This value set contains a point-in-time expansion enumerating the codes that meet the value set intent. As new versions of the code systems used by the value set are released, the contents of this expansion will need to be updated to incorporate newly defined codes that meet the value set intent. Before, and periodically during production use, the value set expansion contents SHOULD be updated. The value set expansion specifies the timestamp when the expansion was produced, SHOULD contain the parameters used for the expansion, and SHALL contain the codes that are obtained by evaluating the value set definition. If this is ONLY an executable value set, a distributable definition of the value set must be obtained to compute the updated expansion.

name: Anxiety
title: Anxiety
description: This value set contains codes representing conditions related to anxiety.
purpose: This value set contains codes for conditions related to anxiety as outlined in the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-IV-TR). It was created to identify a patient at high risk for opioid therapy, therefore may not represent all anxiety-related disorders (e.g., fear of flying or bridges).
